data.name: SISYPHUS
data.detailed_description:
Join Sisyphus in his quest for revenge in this physics-based platforming adventure where you control not only Sisyphus, but his magical rock as well.



  • Traverse from Hades’ Underworld to the top of Mount Olympus in 40+ levels of intense platforming challenges
  • Launch the rock with just a point and click
  • Crush enemies that block your path using your rock
  • Halt the rock with magic in order to land at just the right spot
  • Maneuver yourself as Sisyphus while still chained to your rock
  • Listen to original tracks for the Underworld and Overworld
  • Master gravity or die trying
data.about_the_game:
Join Sisyphus in his quest for revenge in this physics-based platforming adventure where you control not only Sisyphus, but his magical rock as well.



  • Traverse from Hades’ Underworld to the top of Mount Olympus in 40+ levels of intense platforming challenges
  • Launch the rock with just a point and click
  • Crush enemies that block your path using your rock
  • Halt the rock with magic in order to land at just the right spot
  • Maneuver yourself as Sisyphus while still chained to your rock
  • Listen to original tracks for the Underworld and Overworld
  • Master gravity or die trying
data.short_description: After an eternity of toiling away at meaningless divine punishment, Sisyphus has finally snapped. Join Sisyphus in his quest for revenge as he weaponizes the very rock chaining him down to steamroll and swing his way to the top of Mount Olympus, while breaking a few laws of physics along the way.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion 10.7.5, 32/64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0+
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
